entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • FileSystemWatcher on sub-directory prevents parent directory from being renamed #103383
  • Unable to debug crash dump created on machine using Ubuntu 24.04 feed runtime. #103377
  • [Android] Mono startup crash (mono_runtime_invoke_checked, mono_assembly_request_byname) #103371
  • x64 test failure: DeserializeStoredObjects strings differ. #103367
  • Inconsistent behavior using interface with generic out and derived classes with explicit implementations #103365
    9.0.0
  • JIT should support custom `ClassLayout` instances with GC refs #103362
    9.0.0
  • [Android] Runtime/BCL native libs need support for devices with 16k memory pages (arm64 and x64) #103360
    Future
  • Referencing assemblies produced by PersistedAssemblyBuilder generates a System.Private.CoreLib compiler error #103357
  • System.Net.Security.Tests.SslStreamTlsResumeTests failing #103354
    9.0.0
  • ConfigurationRoot GetValue behavior changed #103353
    Future
  • CI timeout in System.Data.Tests.DataSetTest2.Bug537229_BinFormatSerializer_Test #103350
  • ExplicitConversion_FromSingle failing due to NaN != NaN #103347
  • Installation of .NET 8.0+ disables mouse #103343
  • Possible backport of "Read EnableWriteXorExecute from runtimeConfig" to .NET 8 #103340
  • No easy way to invoke byte comparison operator #103336
  • Debug Assertion Violation: 'codeManager->IsUnwindable(pvAddress) || runtime->IsConservativeStackReportingEnabled()' #103333

Closed

  • Ensure that Microsoft.Extensions.Http.DefaultHttpClientFactory is supporting distributed tracing #103192
  • Update .NET 9 Arm32 for Y2038 #101944
  • illink: Unhandled exception. Mono.Linker.InternalErrorException: Type ShareExtensionTest.ShareViewController already has applied All. #103115
  • Do you need (should you have) every version of .NET installed? #103373
  • Minor race condition in HttpHeaders parsing #103238
    9.0.0
  • Configuration: IList properties initialized with Array.Empty not deserialized #103282
  • is there a way to not show native AOT warnings for statically inaccessible code during build? #103250
  • Update `ConfigureHttpClientDefaults` to provide `IHttpClientBuilder` with the actual `Name` of an `HttpClient` #101719
  • Do not trim private methods used by the designer #102244
    9.0.0
  • Minor cleanup of approved Avx512 API surface #86168
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: ReadOnlySet<T> #100113
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Regex.EnumerateSplits #100369
    9.0.0
  • [Microsoft.Extensions.Logging] Bug: Logging arrays is broken and behaves unreliably #103338
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'cond == test' during 'Optimize post-layout' #103252
    9.0.0
  • Spring 2024 repo health check #101456
  • AccessViolationException in HttpClient.SendAsync() on macOS arm64 in .NET 9 preview.4 #102313
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: TensorPrimitives.HammingDistance #102980
    9.0.0
  • System.IO.Pipelines issue: Ureleased memory after reader.Complete #103149
  • cannot run winform app in dotnet 9 preview 6 #103329
  • Visual Studio 2022 and .Net 8.0 #103335
  • Re-JIT tier1 methods (e.g. with AggressiveOptimization attribute) #13709
    Future
  • Support TLS Resume with client certificates on Linux #94561
    Future
  • [8.0][ios][arm64][mono] Build error: SecKeychainUnlock signing-certs.keychain-db: user name or passphrase incorrect #101830

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow gtFoldExprSpecial to handle side effects #103382
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • match IPv4MappedToIPv6 address in IPv4 networks #103381
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • Update-eol-versions-6.0-staging #103380
    needs-area-label
  • Update EOL versions (main) #103379
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update azure.storage.blob/queue and azure.identity pip install packages. #103378
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Consolidate LocateNativeCompiler target #103375
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Enable DATAS by default. #103374
    NO-MERGE, area-GC-coreclr
  • use also SslCertificateTrust when constructing CertificateContext #103372
    area-System.Net.Security, 9.0.0
  • ARM64-SVE: gathervector extends #103370
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Enable CET testing in CI #103369
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fixing API to use in and ReadOnly as needed #103368
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/6.0-staging] Merge 1ES templates #103366
    area-Infrastructure
  • update proxy setting on registry changes #103364
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Fix assembly name parser to accommodate non-ASCII UTF8 strings #103363
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Stack allocate unescaped boxes #103361
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable SslStreamTlsResumeTests.(No)?ClientCert_DefaultValue_ResumeSucceeds on ARM #103359
    area-System.Net.Security
  • JIT: Add stress mode for skipping lowering conditional nodes to use CPU flags #103358
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Support overriding MsQuic.dll in the application directory on Windows. #103351
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2472367 #103348
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Remove the OCSP nonce #103344
    area-System.Security
  • [QUIC] Add platform guard to `IsSupported` #103342
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [Android] Allow using installed certificates for client authentication in SslStream #103337
    area-System.Security, os-android
  • Update SDK to 9.0 Preview 5 #103332
    area-Infrastructure
  • Don't report dependency on canonical forms just because there's GVMs #103331
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • update parsing for manually configured proxy on Windows #103328
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • clrinterp: Add missing must-expand intrinsics #103326
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Revert "Dedup UnboundedChannel and UnboundedPriorityChannel (#101396)" #103325
    area-System.Threading.Channels

Merged

  • Block System.Numerics.Tensors tests on native AOT #103248
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • Add AllocationTick event test scenario #103290
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Fixed the discrepancy between applicationName between normal app launch and HostFactoryResolver launch #102152
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Ensure that the CvtVectorToMask node is inserted in the right place #103356
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allow TypePreserve info to be applied multiple times #103140
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Reduce allocation in HttpUtility.UrlPathEncode. #102909
    community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Fix race condition in HttpHeaders parsing #103263
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Don't trim ShouldSerializeXXX and ResetXXX members that may be called with reflection #102780
    Servicing-more-info, area-System.Data, 9.0.0
  • Consolidate <NativeAotSupported definitions #103273
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Specify and test that `0x` is case-invariant in the Convert class #101876
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Remove `ResourceUpdater.IsSupportedOS` from HostModel #103327
    area-HostModel
  • Support IAlternateEqualityComparer with FrozenDictionary/Set #103191
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add native ARM64 popcount for sizeof(T) above 1 to TensorPrimitives #103214
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Fix darc publish while we wait for new arcade #103355
    needs-area-label
  • Add test for invalid trim annotations in top-level method #103182
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: Added SVE `Prefetch*` APIs. #103094
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Adding support for Avx512Vbmi.MultiShift #103310
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Attempt to fix DuplicateAndClose_TcpServerHandler flaky test #103161
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Add ReadOnlySet<T> #103306
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [browser] Increase timeout for System.Memory.Tests and System.Private.Xml.Tests #103221
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Add Regex.EnumerateSplits #103307
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation
  • ARM64-SVE: gathervector #103159
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • JIT: Handle `GT_JTRUE` nodes during post-layout condition reversal #103319
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add TensorPrimitives.HammingDistance and friends #103305
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix alloc-dealloc mismatch in GC #102929
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0-staging] Merge #78968 #103312
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [vm] fix confusing use of m_pCanonMT (NFC) #102936
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Block failing ARM32 test on a new issue #103334
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [CI][aot] Do not overwrite `scenarios` argument if they were passed #103229
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, disabled-test
  • [android] Fix build withe newer NDK #103233
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Arm64/SVE: Implement ConvertToInt32 and ConvertToUInt32 for float #103098
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2470755 #102770
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Support TLS Resume with client certificates on Linux #102656
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Share more of the TYP_MASK handling and support rewriting TYP_MASK operands in rationalization #103288
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Bring back JIT support for core Vector64/128/256/512 APIs #103177
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable cetcompat for corerun #103311
    area-VM-coreclr

Updated

  • fix hang when `prepare_to_change_heap_count` fails #103386
  • Move the working BinaryFormatter implementation to a NuGet package #103255
    area-System.Runtime, binary-serialization, 9.0.0
  • CI test #99871
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Dispose XmlReader in SchemaExporter when done #103286
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Remove global spinlock for EH stacktrace #103076
    NO-MERGE, area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add Base64url encoding/decoding #102364
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Adding some constant folding support for basic floating-point operations #103206
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make System.Formats.Nrbf public #103232
    area-System.Security, binary-serialization
  • [HybridGlobalization] Pass non-breaking space / narrow non-breaking space characters #103226
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-browser
  • Add JsonSchemaExporter. #103322
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Fix 97272 #99818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use BigMul in BigMul #100918
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Add new DiagnosticMethodInfo public API #103220
    area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Make all of the trimmer aware of recursive interfaces #103317
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Adding support for open generic types in attributes #103213
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Create ReadOnlySpan marshaller for ManagedToUnmanagedOut scenarios #101095
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Update docs for ByRefLike with generics #103318
    area-Meta, 9.0.0
  • Use LTO for linux as well #103058
    needs-area-label
  • [wasm] emscripten bump 3.1.56 #100334
    area-Build-mono
  • [cdac] Implement ISOSDacInterface.GetThreadData #103324
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Dispose IDisposables in RegexGenerator #103142
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • Delete -fms-extensions from coreclr native build #102834
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Move the thread alloc context off of Thread in CoreCLR and NativeAOT #103055
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-VM-coreclr
  • Optimize BigInteger.Divide #96895
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Optimize BigInteger.Parse #97589
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Make normal statics simpler #99183
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [mono] Remove some domain stuff from the debugger #103186
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Added SIMD path for Vector3, Quaternion and Matrix4x4 operations #99547
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Fold identical method bodies in the compiler #101969
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Some System.Decimal performance improvements #99212
    area-System.Numerics, needs-author-action
  • remove unnecessary Avx512VL ISA flags. #103144
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Cleanup some handling around Avx10v1 #103241
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add OrderedDictionary #103309
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource] Implement metrics advice API #102524
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Add support for building CoreCLR for iOS/tvOS simulator #98127
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-ios, community-contribution
  • Ported interleaving support to System.IO.Packaging #97898
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Expand host_runtime_contract to get assembly names and resolve their paths #100503
    area-Host
  • Enable NativeAOT runtime tests on MacCatalyst #102882
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-maccatalyst, 9.0.0
  • Add randomized allocation sampling #100356
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix SIMD12 spills #102736
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V][x64] WiP: Passing empty struct fields #101796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Add support for Sve.DuplicateSelectedScalarToVector() #103228
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Cleanup VARIANT marshalling and convert to managed #102498
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Fix `SwiftError` variable offset calculation #103043
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Fix: `HybridGlobalization` Invariant function differs from non-Hybrid #103037
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, os-browser
  • [android] Don't include `JNI_OnLoad` in `libSystem.Security.Cryptography.Native.Android.a` #103231
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [HTTP/3] Wrap Cancelled Request with OCE instead of QuicException #103081
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Convert remaining array FCalls to managed #102739
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Testing] CET pipeline #103179
  • Use Type.GetProperty/GetField instead of GetMember. #103275
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Migrate to zlib-ng, part 2: consume it in runtime #102403
    area-System.IO.Compression

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-12
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Use clang from EMSDK directly to compile bitcode #2603

Updated

  • [NativeAOT LLVM] Support dotnet.js #2434
  • [Discussion] Generate C# bindings for SwiftUI framework #2594
  • [Discussion] Generate C# bindings for Foundation framework #2584

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Don't always build the runtime and fix static graph restore for BuildIntegration.proj #2613

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Don't use the `emcc` wrapper for bitcode compilation #2612
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] JSExport-based async main #2610
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Workaround to align thread statics to 8 byte boundary #2609
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] A few tweaks/fixes to `install-llvm.ps1` #2611
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Trusted roots: 2024-06 CTL #41564
  • [9.0-preview.5] dotnet test fails on Windows when error is logged to the test output #41541
  • [NETSDKE2E]With NET9 preview 6 sdk installed, create blazorwasm project failed with error "Could not resolve SDK "Microsoft.NET.Runtime.Emscripten.Python.${NetVersion}". Exactly one of the probing messages bel..." #41538

Closed

  • Introduce "bint" as a new keyword for BigInteger #38979
  • package table is not updating #41559
  • Source Build fails CI for SDK @ release/6.0.1xx #40320
  • -p:DebugSymbols=false does not disable generation of .pdb files #41364

PullRequests

Created

  • Trusted roots: 2024-06 CTL #41565
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use Aspire 8.0 workload in the 9.0 SDK #41562
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • update sdk preview 5 #41560
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Re-Bootstrap Source Build to .NET 9.0.100-preview.6.24312.1 #41558
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #41553
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add --rid top level option #41540
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Create 0001-upgrade-jdk-version.patch #41563
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Respect DebugSymbols=false Fixes #41364 #41384
    Review for breaking changes, untriaged, breaking-change, Area-NetSDK, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Add back a line that was lost in dotnet/installer migration #41537
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Dispose HttpClient in WorkloadManifestUpdater #41489
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Add missing Restore option for ArtifactsPath and tests #41532
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • [Static Web Assets] Resolve tokens on the generated initializers module manifest #41533
    untriaged

Updated

  • filter references for satellite assembly generation down to just the primary assemblies #38504
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Implement dotnet test help option #41142
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • Workload history 3 #36809
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Dispose HttpClient and Stream in AddPackageParser #41490
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #41534
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • source-build: bundle NativeAOT libraries with the SDK. #41198
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Proposal]: Extending patterns to "as" #8210

PullRequests

Created

  • Extract open issues and organize Expressions section #8209
  • Link LDM from ref-in-async speclet #8208

Merged

  • Fix n-1 version, it is version 12, not 11 #8204
  • Make implicit span a conversion from expression #8152

Updated

  • Add open questions for partial properties interaction with field keyword #8202
  • Add extension codegen details #8121
  • Add detailed design to clarify the field keyword spec and incorporate all LDM decisions #8069
  • Add extension WG meeting notes on type erasure codegen #8194

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Peek definition doesn't work on source-generated methods #73970
  • EnforceCodeStyleInBuild reports suggestions as errors in 8.0.300 #73974
    17.12
  • CS8795 reported when expression with reference to another assembly happen #73964
  • VB.NET SemanticModel doesn't resolve type of a member even though it could #73961
    Backlog
  • PostProcessChangesAsync(Document, CancellationToken) is not called anymore #73957
  • Test performance regression between 4.8 and 4.9.2, still there in 4.10 #73956
  • Breakpoints incorrectly added after hot reload #73955

Closed

  • Edit.Duplicate command does not insert trailing newline between original and duplicated code #73891
  • Visual Studio won't show errors and Error list doesn't switch to code line after doubl click #73863
  • Hints for reinstalling Nuget disappeared #73936
    Backlog
  • Warning AD0001 : Analyzer '' threw an exception of type 'System.NullReferenceException' with message 'Object reference not set to an instance of an object.'. #72046
    Backlog
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35011.102 #73960
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-35011.277 #73959
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35012.02 #73958

PullRequests

Created

  • Move builds to 1ES PT #73973
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add generated semantic search API list #73966
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to release/dev17.10 #73954
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Report diagnostic for `field` in property accessors regardless of language version #73952
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Remove option controlling which persistence DB to use. #73969
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.6 to release/dev17.8 #73953
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Remove A/B option for enabling features in SG docs. #73968
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Move VSExtensibility back to the nuget.org version #73972
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add another TS extension path #73971
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add Microsoft.Identity.Client and System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Jwt to InternalTools.props #73967
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Expose Roslyn LSP types to XAML and add readme #73942
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove A/B option to disable recoverable texts #73965
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add documentation to Values property in TypedConstant struct #73912
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Remove unused scripts #73963
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #73932
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Use a serialization compatible marker #73851
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Add Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens to InternalTools.props and add restore source #73950
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update required VS to 17.8. #73951
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.6 to release/dev17.8 #73929
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Add Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens to InternalTools.props #73948
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Parse `field` and `value` as contextual keywords #73947
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Use correct get / set inside ref safety analysis #73842
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Smart Rename: Provide additional context for renamed symbol #73873
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Improve parser recovery around nullable types in patterns #72805
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • ChildSyntaxList.ItemInternal optimization #73650
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add standard implicit array-to-Span conversions #73577
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Search less projects when looking for linked documents #73939
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Ensure that when EnC finishes that it disposes the OOP connection it is holding onto #73465
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Rename SG run mode from Balanced to Manual #73784
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Include wrapping options in editorconfig formatting options #73938
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add a delay for SmartRename if user begins to type #73949
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Upgrade MicrosoftCodeAnalysisTestingVersion to 1.1.2-beta1.24121.1 #73840
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Doc Cookbook Auto Interface Implementation #73906
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Check duplicate interfaces only for metadata #73797
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2470703 #73415
    auto-merge

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Weird file created during webpack when upgrading to SignalR 8.0.0 #56213
  • Properties with the `[Required]` attribute should be required in the generated OpenAPI document #56212
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts #56209
  • Perf improvement: endpoint, plaintext, plainTextEmptyFilter #56208
  • Build in AuthenticationStateProvider breaks after trimming #56207
  • Increase@Url.Action function Overload #56204
  • User Login Session could not maintain in Blazor Client Server Interactive Auto render mode. #56203
  • Perf improvement: plainTextWithFilter #56201
  • Dereference the result of createJSObjectReference from JavaScript #56200

Closed

  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes #56184
  • Perf improvement: json_middleware #56193
  • Perf regression: fortunes #56202
  • WsFed Authentication Broken when using Lax for Correlation Cookie #56195
  • Blazor Server OIDC Logout with Keycloak Redirects but Cookies Not Cleared #56198
  • "No authentication handlers are registered" but there is one #56103
  • MSB8020 error when building the repo #56171
  • Add an option to enforce case-sensitive URLs #56118

PullRequests

Created

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Android] CarouselView many issues with CurrentItem bindings #23023

    Backlog
  • Shell.BackButtonBehavior interferes with Flyout icon #23015
  • App crashes when calling ItemsView.ScrollTo on unloaded CollectionView #23014
  • SecureStorage returns null for all values after restarting app (Android) #23013
  • Version 17.10.0 will not parse one of my XAML pages in a maui app #23012
  • Maui programs on Windows and Android do not access sites and url #23011
  • .NET 8 MAUI Push Notifications (Android) using Azure Notification Hub FCM V1 protocol #23010
  • NotificationHubs Version 4.2 Runtime Error #23009
  • .Net Maui Styles break in 17.10 of Visual Studio #23008
  • Resize, when 200% Zoomed Items present in Home screen are getting truncated: A11y_.NET Core_Recipes App Home Screen_Home Screen_Resize. #23005
    .NET 8 SR8
  • Edit box outline is not visible for Ingredients, Recipe, Review edit field: A11y_.NET Core_Recipes App My Recipes New_New Recipe_Usability #23003
    .NET 8 SR8
  • There is No Status message is announced to screen reader users when results are loaded: A11y_.NET Core_Recipes App Recipes Search_Search box_Status message. #23002
    .NET 8 SR8
  • Voiceover is not announced "item added or updated" when user is adding or editing a new Recipe or existing Recipe: A11y_.NET Core_Recipes App My Recipes Edit_Edit Recipe_Screen reader. #23001
    .NET 8 SR8
  • Voiceover is not announcing for Recipe search and My recipes as list items: A11y_.NET Core_Recipes App Home Screen_Home Screen_Screen reader. #23000
    .NET 8 SR8
  • Splash screen and Material Icons not showing correctly on Android Release build, real device. #22999

    Triaged
  • DatePicker Color Icon #22987

    Backlog

Closed

  • No service for type 'Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Hosting.EffectsFactory' has been registered #22748

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cosmos: translate date/time component members/methods #33975
    9.0.0
  • Querying all objects of a type hierarchy #33972
  • Add-Migration failing with new Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Workspaces v4.10.0 #33970
  • Cosmos: handle fake LeftJoins in query tree #33969
    9.0.0
  • Cosmos: subquery pushdown #33968
    9.0.0
  • Storing Same Entity In Json Column Does Not Work #33967

Closed

  • Opt-out from retry strategy on PostgreSQL #33912
  • Getting Exception two type of exception at System.Data.SQLite.SQLiteConnection.Open() #33971
  • Misleading exception text: FromSqlRaw returns “missing column” error for wrong column #33748
    Backlog
  • Translate non-aggregate string.Join to SQL Server CONCAT_WS #28899
    Backlog
  • Test fails with connection resolved from provider of AddDbContext but succeeds with one resolved from services of ConfigureTestServices() #33965
  • EF 7 is generating SQL with incorrect syntax near the keyword OPTION #33962

PullRequests

Created

  • Cosmos: add translations for date/time components #33976
  • Run Cosmos tests as a separate step #33974
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #33973
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Merged

  • [release/8.0] Use TokenCredential for Cosmos tests #33966
    tell-mode
  • When creating the "missing column" error message, use the same (case insensitive) column name comparer used in field value retrieval #33749
    community-contribution
  • Translate non-aggregate string.Join to CONCAT_WS on SQL Server #28900

Updated

  • Support ReadItem for no-tracking queries #33927
  • Fix for #33702 Translation for the SQL Server PATINDEX function #33868
